goal.ch:
“在本學期結束前, 學生應該達到下列目標:
1. 基本了解何謂英語世界的兒童青少年文學
2. 體驗閱讀許多不同類型的兒童與青少年文學的經典之作
3.理解並欣賞閱讀兒童文學與青少年文學的價值與重要性.
4. 完成閱讀一本青少年小說與4篇閱讀筆記
5. 完成分組討論與期中期末簡報分享
goal.en:
“On successful completion of this course, students will be able to: 
1. Have a general idea on the term “Children’s Literature”. 
2. Enjoy reading a number of the best works in children’s/young adult literature; and to read aloud some of the selections. 
3. Finish reading a selected young adult novel.  
4. keep at least four reading journals. 
5. Give discussions and group presentations on
chosen subject.

textbook.ch:
“1.在相關網站上對兒童文學進行分類閱讀new ee-class。 （參考網站將在課堂上或在上提供）
2.在閱讀坊或圖書館自選關於童謠，兒童詩歌，圖畫書的閱讀選擇。
3.選讀《吟遊詩人皮陀的故事集》，三本精選圖畫書或睡前故事。
4.一部YA小說（您自己選擇）（課堂上將提供一些推薦的小說。）“
textbook.en:
“1. Assorted reading selections on children’s literature on relevant websites. (reference websites will be given in class or on new ee-class) 
2. Self-directed reading choices on nursery rhymes, children’s poems, picture books at Reading Corner or library. 
3. Selected reading on The Tales of Beedle the Bard, three chosen picture books or bedtime stories. 
4. One YA novel (of your own choice) (Some recommended novels will be offered in class.)“

gradMethod.ch:
1.出席率和學習態度 10％
2.小組討論和協作性工作表的完成情況 30％
3.期中大聲朗讀所選的繪本故事和期末選讀小說簡報 30％
4.閱讀筆記 20％
5.問卷 10％
6. 多讀多寫閱讀札記獎勵 (10篇) 10％
gradMethod.en:
1.Attendance and attitude 10％ 
2.Group discussions/worksheets completion 30％ 
3.Read aloud/mid-term/final presentations 30％ 
4.After-reading learning journals 20％  
5.Questionnaire 10％
6.     Bonus points for extra reading journals 10％
